en-US: Due to way too many spam accounts, we have disabled the automatic registration. After applying the join request, please contact @iNKORE_Support in the group to approve your request. You need to answer: 1. In what way did you know our company? 2. What products or services are you interested in? when you apply the join request.
zh-CN: 由于有太多的垃圾账户，我们已禁用自动注册。申请加入后，请马上联系群内的 @iNKORE_Support (找不到就直接搜用户名) 批准您的请求。您需要回答：1. 您是从哪里了解我们公司的？ 2. 您对哪些产品或服务感兴趣？
